verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ <WH5329> To the chief Musician מִזְמ֥וֹר <WH4210> A Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> of David הַשָּׁמַ֗יִם <WH8064> The heavens מְֽסַפְּרִ֥ים <WH5608> declare כְּבֽוֹד־ <WH3519> the glory אֵ֑ל <WH410> of God וּֽמַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <WH4639> the work יָ֝דָ֗יו <WH3027> of his hands מַגִּ֥יד <WH5046> sheweth his הָרָקִֽיעַ׃ <WH7549> and the firmament

י֣וֹם <WH3117> Day לְ֭יוֹם <WH3117> unto day יַבִּ֣יעַֽ <WH5042> uttereth אֹ֑מֶר <WH562> speech וְלַ֥יְלָה <WH3915> and night לְּ֝לַ֗יְלָה <WH3915> unto night יְחַוֶּה־ <WH2331> sheweth דָּֽעַת׃ <WH1847> knowledge

אֵֽין־ <WH369> There אֹ֭מֶר <WH562> [There is] no speech וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> is no דְּבָרִ֑ים <WH1697> nor language בְּ֝לִ֗י <WH1097> is not נִשְׁמָ֥ע <WH8085> is not heard קוֹלָֽם׃ <WH6963> [where] their voice

בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all הָאָ֨רֶץ ׀ <WH776> through all the earth יָ֘צָ֤א <WH3318> is gone out קַוָּ֗ם <WH6957> Their line וּבִקְצֵ֣ה <WH7097> to the end תֵ֭בֵל <WH8398> of the world מִלֵּיהֶ֑ם <WH4405> and their words לַ֝שֶּׁ֗מֶשׁ <WH8121> for the sun שָֽׂם־ <WH7760> In them hath he set אֹ֥הֶל <WH168> a tabernacle בָּהֶֽם׃

וְה֗וּא <WH1931> Which כְּ֭חָתָן <WH2860> Which [is] as a bridegroom יֹצֵ֣א <WH3318> coming out מֵחֻפָּת֑וֹ <WH2646> of his chamber יָשִׂ֥ישׂ <WH7797> [and] rejoiceth כְּ֝גִבּ֗וֹר <WH1368> as a strong man לָר֥וּץ <WH7323> to run אֹֽרַח׃ <WH734> a race

מִקְצֵ֤ה <WH7097> [is] from the end הַשָּׁמַ֨יִם ׀ <WH8064> of the heaven מֽוֹצָא֗וֹ <WH4161> His going forth וּתְקוּפָת֥וֹ <WH8622> and his circuit עַל־ <WH5921> unto קְצוֹתָ֑ם <WH7098> unto the ends וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> and there נִ֝סְתָּ֗ר <WH5641> of it and there is nothing hid מֵֽחַמָּתוֹ׃ <WH2535> from the heat

תּ֘וֹרַ֤ת <WH8451> The law יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD תְּ֭מִימָה <WH8549> [is] perfect מְשִׁ֣יבַת <WH7725> converting נָ֑פֶשׁ <WH5315> the soul עֵד֥וּת <WH5715> the testimony יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> of the LORD נֶ֝אֱמָנָ֗ה <WH539> [is] sure מַחְכִּ֥ימַת <WH2449> making wise פֶּֽתִי׃ <WH6612> the simple

פִּקּ֘וּדֵ֤י <WH6490> The statutes יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD יְ֭שָׁרִים <WH3477> [are] right מְשַׂמְּחֵי־ <WH8055> rejoicing לֵ֑ב <WH3820> the heart מִצְוַ֥ת <WH4687> the commandment יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> of the LORD בָּ֝רָ֗ה <WH1249> [is] pure מְאִירַ֥ת <WH215> enlightening עֵינָֽיִם׃ <WH5869> the eyes

יִרְאַ֤ת <WH3374> The fear יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <WH3068> of the LORD טְהוֹרָה֮ <WH2889> [is] clean עוֹמֶ֪דֶת <WH5975> enduring לָ֫עַ֥ד <WH5703> for ever מִֽשְׁפְּטֵי־ <WH4941> the judgments יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱמֶ֑ת <WH571> [are] true צָֽדְק֥וּ <WH6663> [and] righteous יַחְדָּֽו׃ <WH3162> altogether

הַֽנֶּחֱמָדִ֗ים <WH2530> More to be desired מִ֭זָּהָב <WH2091> [are they] than gold וּמִפַּ֣ז <WH6337> fine gold רָ֑ב <WH7227> yea than much וּמְתוּקִ֥ים <WH4966> sweeter מִ֝דְּבַ֗שׁ <WH1706> also than honey וְנֹ֣פֶת <WH5317> and the drippings צוּפִֽים׃ <WH6688> of the honeycomb

גַּֽם־ <WH1571> Moreover עַ֭בְדְּךָ <WH5650> Moreover by them is thy servant נִזְהָ֣ר <WH2094> warned בָּהֶ֑ם בְּ֝שָׁמְרָ֗ם <WH8104> [and] in keeping עֵ֣קֶב <WH6118> reward רָֽב׃ <WH7227> of them [there is] great
שְׁגִיא֥וֹת <WH7691> error מִֽי־ <WH4310> Who יָבִ֑ין <WH995> Who can understand מִֽנִּסְתָּר֥וֹת <WH5641> thou me from secret נַקֵּֽנִי׃ <WH5352> acquit

גַּ֤ם <WH1571> Also מִזֵּדִ֨ים ׀ <WH2086> also from presumptuous חֲשֹׂ֬ךְ <WH2820> Keep back עַבְדֶּ֗ךָ <WH5650> thy servant אַֽל־ <WH408> not יִמְשְׁלוּ־ <WH4910> [sins] let them not have dominion בִ֣י אָ֣ז <WH227> Then אֵיתָ֑ם <WH8552> over me then shall I be upright וְ֝נִקֵּ֗יתִי <WH5352> and I shall be innocent מִפֶּ֥שַֽׁע <WH6588> transgression רָֽב׃ <WH7227> from the great

יִֽהְי֥וּ <WH1961> become לְרָצ֨וֹן ׀ <WH7522> be acceptable אִמְרֵי־ <WH561> Let the words פִ֡י <WH6310> of my mouth וְהֶגְי֣וֹן <WH1902> and the meditation לִבִּ֣י <WH3820> of my heart לְפָנֶ֑יךָ <WH6440> in thy sight יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> O LORD צוּרִ֥י <WH6697> my strength וְגֹאֲלִֽי׃ <WH1350> and my redeemer
